request.description: Request to the Creatio for getting filtered objects collection instances. or logical parameter with [$filter](https://www.odata.org/documentation/odata-version-3-0/odata-version-3-0-core-protocol/#thefiltersystemqueryoption) parameter using

**[Academy Reference Article](https://academy.creatio.com/docs/developer/back-end_development/configuration_web_service/configuration_web_service#case-1242)**


The cookies received in the HTTP response (BPMLOADER, .ASPXAUTH, BPMCSRF and UserName) are to be used in all further requests to Creatio services that require authentication data. 

Using the **BPMCSRF** cookie and **BPMCSRF** token (see below) is required when protection from CSRF attacks is enabled. Add the “key-value” pair to the request caption. Use “BPMCSRF” as a key and the BPMCSRF cookie value as a value.

**[Academy Identity Service Configuration](https://academy.creatio.com/docs/user/setup_and_administration/on-site_deployment/deployment_additional_setup/set_up_oauth20_authorization_for_integrated_applications)**

Use Authorization Header with every following requests, set Authoriation Header Value to
Bearer access_token
